server package

Submodules

server.website module

This module contains the functions related to the website, the pages and the socket events.

server.website.delete_account()[source]

Delete the user’s account.

Returns:

The index page or the delete account page.

server.website.handle_set_alert_value(data: Dict[str, Any])[source]

Set the alert value for a sensor.

Parameters:

data (dict) – A dictionary containing the sensor ID and the alert value.

Raises:

NotFound – If the sensor ID is invalid.

server.website.index()[source]

Display the index page.

Returns:

The index page.

Raises:

NotFound – If the user is not logged in.

server.website.login()[source]

Display the login page.

Returns:

The login page.

server.website.logout()[source]

Log the user out.

Returns:

The index page.

server.website.page_not_found(error)[source]

Handle 404 errors.

Parameters:

error – The error.

Returns:

The index page.

server.website.register()[source]

Display the register page.

Returns:

The register page.
